title: Episode 418 - Bob Vance Refigeration

itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with "The Office" star Bobby Ray Schaffer and discuss his time on the show, what it's like being a conservative in Hollywood, how he's not going to put up with being quiet anymore because someone might not like hi...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with "The Office" star Bobby Ray Schaffer and discuss his time on the show, what it's like being a conservative in Hollywood, how he's not going to put up with being quiet anymore because someone might not like his politics, and what is what like dating someone from the "Partridge Family".
